title: Age of Ultron + tie-ins + epilogues in reading order
description:
Age of Ultron!!!

Love it or hate it, it was Marvel's first big "event" of 2013, it set the tone and theme for all of Marvel for the year going forward, and it definitely had consequences-- SO many consequences, including the end of an era for the Ultimate Comics universe. Along with some fascinating glimpses into universes that could have been, and new insight into a few key events of the past, Age of Ultron also treated readers to gorgeous artwork from artists such as Carlos Pacheco, Andre Araujo, Butch Guice, Adam Kubert, Bryan Hitch, Alex Maleev, and even Joe Quesada, as well as some excellent character-focused work from luminaries such as Kathryn Immonen, Matt Fraction, Rick Remender, Christos Gage, Al Ewing, Matt Kindt, Mark Waid and of course Brian Michael Bendis. (Avengers Assemble 14 AU, and Age of Ultron 10 A.I. being two of my favorites)


In this compilation, in suggested reading order, are:

Avengers 12.1 [the prologue to the series, published in 2011]

Age of Ultron Book 01
Age of Ultron Book 02
Fantastic Four 005 AU
Superior Spider-Man 006 AU
Age of Ultron Book 03
Avengers Assemble 014 AU
Age of Ultron Book 04
Ultron 001 AU
Age of Ultron Book 05
Avengers Assemble 015 AU
Wolverine and the X-Men 027 AU
Age of Ultron Book 06
Age of Ultron Book 07
Uncanny Avengers 008 AU
Age of Ultron Book 08
Fearless Defenders 004 AU
Age of Ultron Book 09
Age of Ultron Book 10

Age of Ultron Book 10 UC [part of the Age of Ultron Aftermath; the direct results of the Age of Ultron affecting the Ultimate Comics verse, it was renamed and published as "Hunger"]
              Hunger 01
              Hunger 02
              Hunger 03
              Hunger 04
Indestructible Hulk 011 - 015 [part of the Age of Ultron Aftermath]
              Indestructible Hulk 011
              Indestructible Hulk 012
              Indestructible Hulk 013
              Indestructible Hulk 014
              Indestructible Hulk 015
Age of Ultron Book 10 AI [the epilogue]

Avengers A.I. 001 [Avengers A.I. is a new series spinning out of Age of Ultron]



I hope you enjoy this! As always, if you like these books and have the money, buy them and support your favorite creators, writers, artists, local comic shops and publishers. Thanks be to all the uploaders and scanners and seeders out there!
